name: I am Darkness
description:
I am Darkness

I just want to quietly sleep in my deep dark dungeon. Why are you adventurers disturb with your bright torches?

I didn’t mean to do anything bad to you, but now you’ll piss me off. I will plunge the whole world into darkness.

Jump on peasants to convert them into shadows. Jump on enemies to kill them.

Shadows can darken neighbour area and can be resource for summoning higher units.
Hound best for attacking warriors of light.
Hulk good at spreading of darkness.
Totem can spawn new shadows.

Controls:

WASD: Motion

Hold Space: Call for nearest shadows

Hold 1 [numpad]: Summon fluffy hound for 2 nearest  shadows

Hold 2 [numpad]: Summon happy hulk for 3 nearest  shadows

Hold 3 [numpad]: Summon sleepy totem for 4 nearest  shadows

Esc: Exit fullscreen

Tab: Pause

For PGD game jam
